Plot: A childless couple bury a box in their backyard, containing all of their wishes for an infant. Soon, a child is born, though Timothy Green is not all that he appears.
Title: The Odd Life of Timothy Green
Actors: Jennifer Garner, Joel Edgerton, CJ Adams, Odeya Rush
tomatoConsensus: It means well, but The Odd Life of Timothy Green is ultimately too cloyingly sentimental -- and thinly scripted -- to satisfy all but the least demanding viewers.
